name: Nine Miles Down
description:
Nine Miles Down is the first video game from the Infinite Disk Consortium. It is a short PS1 horror-style game where you find yourself in a wooded area with nothing but a flashlight.

Keyboard/Mouse Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Move Camera

Space - Jump

F - Flashlight

Gamepad Controls:

Left Joystick - Movement

Right Joystick - Move Camera

A - Select/Jump

L1/LB - Flashlight
